title: MY PINGS SO HIGH
body:
**guys ..... guys
my ping has recently sky rocketed my internet's fine as far as i know, but this problem has been a real dick, i was playing fine until at around 4:00 my ping got really high and this only occurred around that time but now it is all the time, im not sure if my provider has gone sour ( i dont know that much about internet and computers i just use them) or if the oceanic servers hate me... please help
**

replies.body:
Go to the website speedtest.net and tell me what that says for you :)

If you are on ADSL2+ you should be expecting 20-50 ping 12-20mbps download 0.5-1mbps upload
If they aren't in those ranges you should try giving your ISP a call and telling them the issue. You might even have been shaped for downloading to much.
If you are in those ranges it shouldn't be your provider playing up. But more than likely your router or NIC
